meanings.definition: A person or thing that expunges.
meanings.sent1: The expungers worked diligently to clear the records.
meanings.sent2: The expungers were hired to erase all traces of the crime.
meanings.sent3: The expungers joked about being the 'memory erasers' of the legal world.
meanings.sent4: The expungers were like skilled detectives, uncovering and removing any incriminating evidence.
meanings.sent5: The expungers were like magical erasers, wiping away any past mistakes.
